hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Green Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Bow# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Eyeball Frog#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that Sheik waits at a #monument to time# to teach #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: No matter what happens...Do not give up, do not complain, and do NOT stay up all night playing!

SFM (Saria).text: Did you know that Gorons understood SRM long before speedrunners did?
